alert.note: Alert for Milwaukee; Racine (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 19 at 2:22PM CDT until September 20 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Life threatening waves of 2 to 4 feet and dangerous currents are expected. * WHERE...Milwaukee and Racine Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM CDT this evening through Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected due to high waves and onshore winds. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Several beaches that will be most susceptible to the dangerous swimming conditions include: Bradford Beach in Milwaukee... North Beach in Racine... Wind Point Lighthouse Beach in Racine...
info.instruction: Stay out of the water and away from dangerous areas like piers and breakwalls. Strong structural and longshore currents are expected. Rip currents are possible.
